summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3197, for the improvement of Rainier Avenue (south and west sides) from 57th Avenue South to Ryan Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39499 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
